lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Anything that raises the possiblity of an entirely new therapy for ulcers would attack the core of Glaxo's worldwide business, which is Zantac," said David MacCallum, an analyst who follows Glaxo for Hambrecht and Quist.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Ulcers happen when the stomach's protective lining erodes and is exposed to underlying inflamed tissue, but it is unknown what actually causes the process.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In an editorial in the same issue of the medical journal, Richard Hornick of the University of Rochester School of Medicine, reviewed studies using antibiotics to treat ulcers.
